Each treatment is tailored to individual skin needs, delivering visible results and restoring skin’s natural radiance. Shakura结合先进日本科技，专注于解决色斑问题。采用温和、非侵入性的疗程方式，无需激光或刺激性化学成分，帮助淡化黑斑、痘印与肤色不均。每项疗程都根据顾客的肌肤状况量身定制，帮助肌肤恢复自然光泽。

programme.title: The Wonder Shop (Home Shopping) - Omron Knee TENS
programme.desc: The OMRON Knee TENS is a drug-free, non-invasive device designed to relieve knee pain and stiffness using clinically proven TENS technology. Compact and easy to use, it delivers gentle electrical pulses that stimulate nerves and improve blood circulation, helping to reduce pain from arthritis, injury, or overuse. With customizable intensity levels and ideal for daily use at home or on the go. OMRON 膝盖电疗仪是一款非药物、非侵入式的膝部护理设备，采用微电流技术TENS，有效缓解膝盖疼痛与僵硬感。产品轻巧易用，通过温和电脉冲刺激神经、促进血液循环，帮助缓解因关节炎、运动伤害或过度使用引起的不适。多段强度可调，贴合膝盖设计，提供精准、舒适的护理体验。

programme.title: The Wonder Shop (Home Shopping) - Nature's Farm® Krill Oil 180s
programme.desc: Nature’s Farm Krill Oil is made with SUPERBA 2™ krill oil, one of the most researched krill oils, backed by over 130 clinical trials. It is pure, sustainable, and traceable from catch to capsule. Rich in omega-3s, astaxanthin, phospholipids, and choline, it supports heart, brain, liver, eye, skin, and joint health. Nature's Farm来自南极的磷虾油，富含优质Omega-3脂肪酸和虾红素, 有助于维持胆固醇水平、维护心 脏、大脑和关节健康！ 人体对磷虾油的吸收率更高，没有难闻的鱼腥味，软胶囊更容易吞服，一天2颗有助于维护整体健康！

programme.title: Ricky
programme.desc: When Katie, an ordinary woman, meets Paco, an ordinary man, something magical and miraculous happens: a love story. From this union will be born an extraordinary baby: Ricky.

programme.title: Murders in Porquerolles
programme.desc: The lifeless body of a painter is found on a beach in Porquerolles. Her body at the foot of the cliff evokes the Lycastre, the famous dragon from the legend that gave the bay its name. A rigid prosecutor and a whimsical policewoman team up to investigate.

programme.title: Broll: Buried Alive
programme.desc: Gravedigger Max Broll and retired soccer star Baroni team up to find Max’s stepmother Tilda, the local police commissioner, who has been abducted and buried alive in the woods. The clock is ticking – Tilda won`t survive more than 48 hours underground.

programme.title: Goodnight Mommy
programme.desc: In a secluded countryside home, ten-year-old twins grow suspicious when their mother returns from plastic surgery distant and unrecognizable. Isolated from the world, they embark on a quest to find out whether this woman is their mother.

programme.title: Toubab
programme.desc: Soon after being released from prison, Babtou gets in trouble with the law again. Facing deportation to his foreign birthplace he’s never been to, he and his friend Dennis are willing to do anything to stay in the only home they've ever known: Frankfurt.

programme.title: Carte Blanche
programme.desc: An uplifting tale of Kacper, a charismatic high school history teacher who hides his progressing blindness from everyone around him to fulfil his educational duties. His methods are unorthodox, sometimes hilarious, and devilishly effective.

programme.title: Murders in Pont-Aven
programme.desc: The bodies of two gallery owners are found. These murders are reminiscent of the death of Suzanne, a painter, 20 years ago. The investigation is led by Marion, Suzanne's daughter, and by Antoine who was in charge of the investigations at the time.

programme.title: Hunting Season
programme.desc: Enersto, a hunting guide in Patagonia, is left to take care of his teenage son he hasn’t seen for years. An intense father-son relationship is played out amidst the hostility of nature.

programme.title: Ricky

programme.title: Carte Blanche
programme.desc: An uplifting tale of Kacper, a charismatic high school history teacher who hides his progressing blindness from everyone around him to fulfil his educational duties. His methods are unorthodox, sometimes hilarious, and devilishly effective.

programme.title: Hunting Season
programme.desc: Enersto, a hunting guide in Patagonia, is left to take care of his teenage son he hasn’t seen for years. An intense father-son relationship is played out amidst the hostility of nature.

programme.title: Homicide Unit Istanbul: Thailand (1)
programme.desc: A prisoner transfer to Thailand goes horribly wrong for Detectives Mehmet and Mustafa when the pair are kidnapped by a local crime family and Mehmet is forced to break their boss out of prison to save Mustafa’s life.

programme.title: Brado
programme.desc: An estranged father-son duo find themselves reunited when the father needs help running the family ranch after an injury. As they train a rebellious horse for a cross-country race, the pair learns to rebuild their relationship and heal from their pain.

programme.title: Hard Luck
programme.desc: A family comes to the funeral of their beloved grandfather. After the burial it turns out that the numbers grandfather always bet at the lottery just won big, but the winning ticket was buried with him. The race for the buried ticket begins.

programme.title: Clean Sweep 1: Done Is Done
programme.desc: Shelly Mohan, a housewife and mother of three, makes an irreparable decision and commits a horrific act when Charlie Lynch, a man from her troubled past, contacts her.

programme.title: Clean Sweep 2: Post Mortem
programme.desc: Shelly's husband Jason, a Garda Detective, is delighted to be assigned to the case, with no sense where the trail may lead. While he and his co-worker, Fiona, focus on a sex worker, Shelly realizes she may have left evidence in the dead man's hotel room.

programme.title: Djam
programme.desc: Djam, a bold young Greek woman, travels to Istanbul to look for an engine part for her uncle’s boat. She meets a stranded and penniless Avril, who is a volunteer for Syrian refugees. Together, they embark on a lively, music-filled journey to Mytilene.

programme.title: A Dose Of Happiness
programme.desc: Vesala’s search for happiness led her into an early marriage and a 3-year-old daughter. After her marriage fails, she and her daughter are brought down a path that leads to hell and back, one which brings her through drugs, fall, fear and redemption.

programme.title: Homicide Unit Istanbul: Thailand (2)
programme.desc: With his colleague’s life on the line, Inspector Mehmet has to bust Thai crime boss Worawit out of jail. But an ambush by the Red Dragon gang leaves Worawit kidnapped and Mehmet injured and semi-conscious. How will Mehmet save his colleague now?

programme.title: Wars
programme.desc: Following in her father’s footsteps, and yearning to fill the existential emptiness within her, 20-year-old Emma decides to join the army. In an environment of harsh discipline and repressive rules, Emma unexpectedly falls in love with her superior.

programme.title: Blizzard of Souls
programme.desc: After losing his mother and his home, Arturs finds some consolation in joining the army. However, war is nothing like he imagined.

programme.title: Clean Sweep 3: Find Her
programme.desc: As Shelly attempts to maintain her routine, she is haunted by her past. When Lynch's true identity is discovered, a UK cold case officer re-opens a case which she is convinced involves Lynch and his then girlfriend.

programme.title: Clean Sweep 4: Deirdre
programme.desc: Shelly's attempts to bond with Derek are not a success. Meanwhile, following the lead of the hotel sex-worker, Jason and Fiona discover victims of a brutal trafficking organisation.

programme.title: Run To You
programme.desc: Gianni is a serial seducer, but his life is destined to change when he meets Chiara, a beautiful woman who has had an accident and is paraplegic.

programme.title: Passed by Censor
programme.desc: In an Istanbul prison, Zakir is tasked with reading and censoring the letters inmates receive. Tasked with a writing assignment for his night class, Zakir uses a photograph of an inmate's wife for inspiration, but fantasy soon morphs into delusion.
